title: The Office (2005) Season 2 [Censored/Clean/Edited]
description:
This is a totally clean/censored version of The Office that I have made. It's the same as the original show, but without the majorly crude jokes. Some very minor crude jokes still remain, like "I'll take your thoughts and digest them, and see what comes out the other end" or "my future's not gonna be determined by 7 little white lotto balls. It's gonna be determined by two big black balls". Basically any crude jokes that are relating to sex are removed, but I had it done in a way where you can't usually tell that anything was even removed , and the story line is still kept intact. Still has some minor language, but there were a few parts I took out that had an unusual amount of language that had nothing to do with the story.

WARNING!
Episode 2 (Originally named Sexual Harassment) had a very unusual amount of dirty jokes, so it was very tricky to remove them without affecting the story line of the episode. There may be some very minor sexual references, but nothing too out of line. You might be better off skipping this episode, as it doesn't play a very big part on the story of the show. Although it does introduce Todd Packers character, and Pam's mom, and Michael talking about who Toby is and what he thinks of him.

Episodes in this season:

1. The Dundies
2. Harassment
3. Office US Olympics
4. The Fire
5. Halloween
6. The Fight
7. The Client
8. Performance Review
9. E-mail Surveillance
10. Christmas Party
11. Booze Cruise
12. The Injury
13. The Secret
14. The Carpet
15. Boys and Girls
16. Valentine's Day
17. Dwight's Speech
18. Take Your Daughter to Work Day
19. Michael's Birthday
20. Drug Testing
21. Conflict Resolution
22. Casino Night

Frame width: 1280
Frame height: 720
Size: About 330 MB to 350 MB each
